description: Contains player-specific stats over the whole game.

average_serve_speed.description: The average speed of serves by the player (MPH).

average_speed_shot.description: The average speed of shots by the player (MPH).

ball_directions.description: Categorizes ball directions across a player's shots (9 total).

down_the_line_left_count.description: A shot played from the left straight down the left sideline.
down_the_line_left_count.title: Count

down_the_line_right_count.description: A shot played from the right straight down the right sideline.
down_the_line_right_count.title: Count

down_the_middle_count.description: A shot played from the middle straight down the middle of the court.
down_the_middle_count.title: Count

left_cross_right_count.description: A shot played from the left side of the court that crosses over to the right side.
left_cross_right_count.title: Count

left_to_middle_count.description: A shot played from the left side of the court towards the middle.
left_to_middle_count.title: Count

mid_cross_left_count.description: A shot played from the middle of the court that crosses over to the left side.
mid_cross_left_count.title: Count

mid_cross_right_count.description: A shot played from the middle of the court that crosses over to the right side.
mid_cross_right_count.title: Count

right_cross_left_count.description: A shot played from the right side of the court that crosses over to the left side.
right_cross_left_count.title: Count

right_to_middle_count.description: A shot played from the right side of the court towards the middle.
right_to_middle_count.title: Count

ball_directions.title: Ball Directions

court_coverage.description: Categorizes various statistics about a players court coverage across all rallies.

average_x_coverage_percentage.description: The average amount of time each player spent on the left side of the court.

heat_map_coordinates.description: An array of x/y pairs representing the player positions during any shot event where the player is on the court.

x.description: Scaled value representing the player's position across the width of the court.

y.description: Scaled value representing the player's position across the length of the court.

heat_map_coordinates.title: Heat Map Coordinates

total_distance_covered.description: The number of feet each player travels between shots in all rallies combined.

court_coverage.title: Court Coverage

final_shot_count.description: The total number of final shots by the player.
final_shot_count.title: Count

ground_stroke_count.description: The total number of ground strokes by the player.
ground_stroke_count.title: Count

left_side_percentage.description: The percentage of shots that went to the left side.
left_side_percentage.title: Percentage

return_count.description: The total number of returns by the player.
return_count.title: Count

serve_count.description: The total number of serves by the player.
serve_count.title: Count

shot_count.description: The total number of shots by the player.
shot_count.title: Count

returns.description: how often returns land in various zones

deep.description: how often the ball landed deep in the opponents court
deep.title: Percentage

kitchen.description: how often the ball landed in the opponents kitchen
kitchen.title: Percentage

mid.description: how often the ball landed in the transition zone in the opponents court
mid.title: Percentage

net.description: how often the ball hit the net (fault); excludes balls which touched the net but rolled or bounced over
net.title: Percentage

out.description: how often the ball hit outside the court (fault)
out.title: Percentage

short.description: how often the ball landed short in the opponents court
short.title: Percentage

returns.title: Zone Stats

serves.description: how often serves land in various zones

deep.description: how often the ball landed deep in the opponents court
deep.title: Percentage

kitchen.description: how often the ball landed in the opponents kitchen
kitchen.title: Percentage

mid.description: how often the ball landed in the transition zone in the opponents court
mid.title: Percentage

net.description: how often the ball hit the net (fault); excludes balls which touched the net but rolled or bounced over
net.title: Percentage

out.description: how often the ball hit outside the court (fault)
out.title: Percentage

short.description: how often the ball landed short in the opponents court
short.title: Percentage

serves.title: Zone Stats

team.description: The team to which the player belongs.

avg_height_over_net.description: The average height over net across shots.

count.description: The total number of shots by the player.
count.title: Count

avg_height_over_net.description: The average height over net across shots.

count.description: The total number of shots by the player.
count.title: Count

avg_height_over_net.description: The average height over net across shots.

count.description: The total number of shots by the player.
count.title: Count

top_speed_serve.description: The top speed serve of the player (MPH).

top_speed_shot.description: The top speed shot of the player (MPH).

total_team_shot_percentage.description: The percentage of total team shots taken by the player.
total_team_shot_percentage.title: Percentage

volley_count.description: The total number of volleys by the player.
volley_count.title: Count

title: Player Stats
